website_summaries.verdict: A must-have for style-conscious men who have their hearts set on Movado without spending the extremely high-end price of some others in its class.
pros: Has with the classic Movado museum style—simple, attractive black dial with single dot, stainless-steel case and black leather strap
Gets high marks for its affordability when compared to other options by the high-fashion brand
cons: A few men complain that the band runs a bit small on larger wrists
At least one consumer had concerns about authenticity, but many more were impressed with the quality

customer_reviews.title: Quality build, but fake.
customer_reviews.text: From the bevel between the crystal front and the watch base to the "Swiss Movado Quartz" (real Movado watches say "Swiss Movado Made" or "Swiss Made"), to the lightweight construction, this not a genuine Movado timepiece. While it may be a solid, quality construction, I have to say it's a knockoff.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch, can fit for everybody
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch , can fit for everybody . :)
customer_reviews.author: Ngoc Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: " but the quality is just as good as a swiss-made watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch sells at the local watch stores inside a mall for $550 minus 15% discount and plus the 9.5% sales tax. I bought it at Amazon for $189. The watch has a tag that says "China Made," but the quality is just as good as a swiss-made watch. So far, the watch is very accurate--no problem whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Honggang Ma

customer_reviews.title: stylish and beautiful watch. Very attractive
customer_reviews.text: This is a really elegant, stylish and beautiful watch. Very attractive. The band is a little short so if you have larger than normal wrists it might be a tight fit for you.
customer_reviews.author: Julz

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and simple...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my husband and he loved it. This watch is versatile, it’s casual and formal at the same time. I love how it looks, very simple but elegant at the same time. Would definitely recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Know what you are buying and the history if the product.
customer_reviews.text: Alot of people dont know watches or watch history, if you know your brand then you know the legitimacy of your product. For everyone that says its fake they really only did a quick google search instead of calling the Movado and checking.
customer_reviews.author: Mustafa

customer_reviews.title: I had to have it
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted this watch since I saw it many years ago at MOMA. Why I haven’t acquired one before now is a mystery. Being a bit of a minimalist this suits me. I know I’ll contnue marveling at its elegant but bold simplicity. Make mine a Movado!
customer_reviews.author: R. Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it, beautifully made, I gave it 5 stars for the watch, I was very disappointed that with Prime I should have received it on or before his birthdate not a day or 2 later.

customer_reviews.title: CHeap - Nots ure if its Original!
customer_reviews.text: This watch was returned once already the leather bad was broken when received. And now 3 month later the little bling in the center of the arms came out! Now there is no way for me to return! Ridiculous for the money we pay not worth it. Really questioning whether its authentic! Avoid buying from this seller!!

customer_reviews.title: Watch faulty
customer_reviews.text: After about 3 months the watch stopped working not sure if it's the battery but wasnt expecting this at all

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I got into watches, I wanted a Movado and I absolutely love this watch! My first watch stop working after 5 days, I simply returned it and Amazon sent me another. I have yet to have any problem with this one

customer_reviews.title: real or  not

product_meta.description:
